title: Ultegra134
author: Ultegra134
content: My cat was poisoned yesterday and died today morning. I know this isn't relevant with the forum but I don't have anyone to talk to in order to let it out. Second day of 2023 and everything seems to be going great..

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Sorry about your cat. I remember when my parent dog died, it was painful and I do not wish to get a dog because of that. But this thread supposed to be in off-topic.

comments.author: Ultegra134
comments.body: Quote from: Charles-Tim on January 02, 2023, 06:16:19 PMSorry about your cat. I remember when my parent dog died, it was painful and I do not wish to get a dog because of that. But this thread supposed to be in off-topic.Thank you, I remember the existence of the off topic section but it wasn't appearing. For some reason I had disabled it. I'll see if it's possible to move it now.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Probably you put it on ignore. Click on profile -> Ignore boards preferences to see the boards you but on ignor.

comments.author: Blond Bimbo
comments.body: I'm very sorry to hear that. One of my cats died for a year ago so I know how it feels. But I'm lucky - I still have five healthy cats in my house.

comments.author: Vyeon11
comments.body: Quote from: Ultegra134 on January 02, 2023, 05:32:48 PMMy cat was poisoned yesterday and died today morning. I know this isn't relevant with the forum but I don't have anyone to talk to in order to let it out. Second day of 2023 and everything seems to be going great..a very bad person who has the heart to poison your cat, even though what's wrong with your cat, if you have something wrong, it's also an animal, don't overdo it until you poison it.they also have life, have life, and they are also creations of Allah, so don't judge animals arbitrarily.

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: Damn, that's downright cruel...Does your house have any CCTV that managed to capture the face of whoever that poisoned it?

comments.author: Tallupooh
comments.body: I used to have a cat and it died from poison, and it makes me sad..I hope you stay strong and patient..

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: Ultegra134 on January 02, 2023, 05:32:48 PMMy cat was poisoned yesterday and died today morning. I know this isn't relevant with the forum but I don't have anyone to talk to in order to let it out. Second day of 2023 and everything seems to be going great..If you are sure it was poisoned (deliberately) you could get the one who poisoned it to give you another one and probably pay for the feeding until it grows up to the one that is said to be dead. People have no right to murder animals that don't deserve to be murderd.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I am so so sorry to hear that your cat was poisoned. That story really makes me feel real mad and I hope the person that did it will have horrible karma coming his way.Maybe you are you not familiar with the rainbow bridge? It makes me so sad to read it but it might be helpful for you in times of sadness. https://www.rainbowsbridge.com/poem.htm

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Losing a family pet is always such a sad time for the family. Thatâ€™s what they are, a genuine member of the family.You will be very upset for quite a while but just be aware that things will get better. Time is a good healer.In the future you will be able to reminisce about the good times that you had with your cat. Nobody can take those memories from you, cherish them because they will stay with you forever. This forum is a good place, full of mostly good people. You can be confident to come here & share real life feelings with us & you will get mostly good advice from the caring, genuine people here.

comments.author: Gracejoy
comments.body: Is always heartbreaking to lose a pet that's has already form part of your life, I am once a victim of it I'm telling you I know what you are passing through. Just big heart and move on

comments.author: Shobhikhan_007
comments.body: Quote from: Ultegra134 on January 02, 2023, 05:32:48 PMMy cat was poisoned yesterday and died today morning. I know this isn't relevant with the forum but I don't have anyone to talk to in order to let it out. Second day of 2023 and everything seems to be going great..Sorry about your cat. I remember what happend to my aquarium. In one night all my fish died because of powercut. Ahh that is the main thing that keep my mind clam while i was stress out.

comments.author: Qaisrani1
comments.body: Sorry to hear about your cat..It is a sad time for you but keep patience. Every thing is going to be fine.

comments.author: DrWho42
comments.body: oof, that's awful. what was your cat's name?

comments.author: OGsmall
comments.body: Sorry for that! Just like me when i lost my hose to it was a badÂ  day for me I cry like a child. ðŸ˜“

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: I'm sure you must be very sad. especially losing a cat that you love. keep the spirit and be patient OP. I'm sure your cat is calm in nature there.
